attributes.action: Scrap the disgraceful practice of charging the public for information on how to obtain a UK passport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A Passport is a fundemental document vital to citzens travelling abroad and information on how to obtain one ought to be readily available to any UK citizen free of charge.  The UK Passport Agency has a single page website containing very little information apart from instructions to telephone them. Upon dialling the caller is, again, given no information and is invited to dial a 0906 number and informed that calls will be charged at £1.15 per minute. This disgraceful practice should be ceased forthwith and the UK Passport Agency should be compelled to act in the service of the citizen taxpayer and give free advice free of charge, if necessary on a properly designed and constructed website.
